labels.label:
Todo : filter out deletes
filter out languages that it cannot-translate

properties.SQL:
SELECT
    sd.lang,
    sd.did,
    sd.type,
    sd.createdAt,
    -- Replace 'text' from source_data with 'TRANSLATED_TEXT' from lookup_data
    ld.TRANSLATED_TEXT AS text,
    sd.original_text
FROM
    original AS sd
CROSS JOIN
    (SELECT TRANSLATED_TEXT FROM enrichment LIMIT 1) AS ld -- Assumes lookup_data is a single-element array
